mapper.select: SELECT PROFILE_IMG, EMOTION_PATH, EMOTION_NAME, "COMMENT", MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM "MEMBER" JOIN EMOTION USING (EMOTION_NO) JOIN MINI_HOMEPAGE USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME FROM ( SELECT ASKED_MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO FROM FRIEND WHERE FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL = 1 AND ASKING_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} UNION SELECT ASKING_MEMBER_NO FROM FRIEND WHERE FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL = 1 AND ASKED_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY MEMBER_NICKNAME

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ASKED_MEMBER_NO MEMBER_NO FROM FRIEND WHERE FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL = 1 AND ASKING_MEMBER_NO = #{homeNo} UNION SELECT ASKING_MEMBER_NO FROM FRIEND WHERE FRIEND_ACCEPT_FL = 1 AND ASKED_MEMBER_NO = #{homeNo}) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginNo}

SELECT CATEGORY, POST_NO, FOLDER_NO, TITLE, SCRAP_YN, OPEN_FL,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - "CREATE" < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - "CREATE") * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - "CREATE" < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - "CREATE") * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - "CREATE" < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - "CREATE") * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - "CREATE" < 30 THEN FLOOR(SYSDATE - "CREATE") || '일 전' WHEN SYSDATE - "CREATE" < 365 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - "CREATE") / 30) || '달 전' ELSE TO_CHAR("CREATE", 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "CREATE"
FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '사진첩' CATEGORY, ALBUM_NO POST_NO, FOLDER_NO, A_TITLE TITLE, A_SCRAP_YN SCRAP_YN, A_OPEN_FL OPEN_FL, A_CREATE "CREATE" FROM ALBUM JOIN CATEGORY_ORDER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{homeNo} AND A_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ALBUM != -1 UNION SELECT '동영상', VIDEO_NO, FOLDER_NO, V_TITLE, V_SCRAP_YN, V_OPEN_FL, V_CREATE FROM VIDEO JOIN CATEGORY_ORDER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{homeNo} AND V_DEL_YN = 'N' AND VIDEO != -1) WHERE OPEN_FL = 1 OR OPEN_FL = 2 OR OPEN_FL = 2 OR OPEN_FL = 3 ORDER BY "CREATE" DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT ME.MEMBER_NO, OWN_FONT_NO, F_COMMENT_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, F_CONTENT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - F_CREATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - F_CREATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - F_CREATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - F_CREATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - F_CREATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - F_CREATE) * 24) || '시간 전' WHEN SYSDATE - F_CREATE < 30 THEN FLOOR(SYSDATE - F_CREATE) || '일 전' WHEN SYSDATE - F_CREATE < 365 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - F_CREATE) / 30) || '달 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(F_CREATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "CREATE"
FROM FRIEND_COMMENT FC JOIN "MEMBER" ME ON (F_WRITER_NO = ME.MEMBER_NO) WHERE FC.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY F_COMMENT_NO DESC
